item.name: Bacon Blaster
item.description: This sandwich is loaded with so much bacon that we might run out of pigs! Bacon and ham layered on top of tomato and lettuce with a touch of mayo will immediately become a family favorite.

item.name: Eggscellent Burger
item.description: An eggscellent eggscuse to enjoy egg! A fried egg on top of our signature beef brings it all home, topped with hash browns and our secret Butter Mah Bunz spiced butter.

item.name: Club Sandwich
item.description: A true classic with our Butter Mah Buns twist! Turkey and ham with bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayo on a bun buttered with our signature spiced butter.

item.name: Sloppy Joe
item.description: Sometimes, simple is just better. Ground beef tossed in our homemade sloppy joe sauce slapped onto a Butter Mah Buns buttered bun. Make sure to grab some extra napkins or pack a second shirt.

item.name: Grilled cheese
item.description: Meunster, Colby Jack, Cheddar, and Pepper Jack cheese layered onto seasoned bread and grilled to perfection in our Butter Mah Buns secret butter. Ooey, gooey, and oh so cheesy~

item.name: Triple Bypass
item.description: The only burger that comes with its own waiver! Beef and bacon intertwine to form a tower of artery-clogging bliss that you may not return from.
